meanings.definition: A type of organic compound consisting of a ring of six carbon atoms with the formula C6H12.
meanings.sent1: Cyclohexanes are commonly used in the production of plastics.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician studied the properties of various cyclohexanes.
meanings.sent3: The cyclohexanes at the party were always in a circle, never breaking formation.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a whirlwind of cyclohexanes, each thought a carbon atom in the ring.
meanings.sent5: The smell of cyclohexanes lingered in the air, a reminder of the lab work.
